title: imgix
description: imgix is the leading platform for end-to-end image processing. With robust APIs, SDKs, and integrations, imgix empowers developers to optimize, transform, manage, and deliver images and videos at scale through simple URL parameters. With 100+ image operations, you can achieve responsive design for any device, browser, or art direction. You can start with our free plan or choose from our flexible plans that scale with you.
